input.sentences: who says castles only exist in fairy tales ?
i took my daughters to an actual castle this summer . every princess deserves to see one in their life time .
some people do n't respect history .
not all areas were accessible but they still made for nice photos .
vandals got a hold of this area and burnt it .
output.sentences: In some tales they say that a fairy exists.
Other stories tell of times in the summer with a princess.
I imagine this but still respect the people and history of the land.
We got some photos that looked nice in some accessible areas of the land.
They told of vandals that were holding pots that burnt a room down.
